text: 1But the staff was so horrible to us.
To be completely fair[comma] the only redeeming factor was the food[comma] which was above average[comma] but couldn't make up for all the other deficiencies of Teodora.
The food is uniformly exceptional[comma] with a very capable kitchen which will proudly whip up whatever you feel like eating[comma] whether it's on the menu or not.
